vclaim: The owner of World Trade Center's building 7 "admitted" it wasn't brought down by the 9/11 terrorist attack but rather by a controlled demolition.
title: No, the Owner of WTC Building 7 Didn’t ‘Admit’ It Was Demolished After 9/11
subtitle: More than two decades later, conspiracy theories about the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attack persist.
author: Bethania Palma
